## Final Project List

```{r, echo=FALSE}
title <- c("An Analysis of Crime in Chicago")
folder <- c("`chicago_crime`")
group <- c("Ry Storey-Fisher, Elana Feldman, and Lisa Schroer")
URL <- c("http://rpubs.com/ry_lisa_elana/chicago")

final_projects <- data_frame(
  Title = title,
  Folder = folder,
  `Team Members` = group
  ) %>% 
  mutate(Title = paste("<a target=\"_blank\" class=\"page-link\" href=\"",  URL, "\">", Title, "</a>", sep=""))

kable(final_projects)
```
